title: Mina's Pussy Cat Club
description: Thirty-four year old Mina Bouvier is the owner and madam of 'Mina’s Pussy Cat Club.' Her John’s call her the perfect Georgia peach. She employs only the best girls in the state and fucks only those customers who can provide her with her own specific needs. Money was secondary because she had more than she would ever need. Her life was nearly perfect. The only thing missing was love. But for her, love was only a dream. Roscoe and Pete are Nevada’s most eligible bachelors. Equally handsome and flamboyant, they share everything. Their women were no exception. They own a ranch the size of Texas and they have more money than Britney Spears. Their lives were nearly perfect. The only thing missing was a loving wife who would be willing to share their lives and their beds equally.Is it possible that one night of passion and the best sex any one of them have ever experienced could be the ticket to their dreams? Wrapped in each other’s arms, they learn that love at first sight is never impossible. At 'Mina’s Pussy Cat Club', sometimes dreams really can come true.
author: Aalexxa Aarows
